text: @Yamiche The US accounts for ONE THIRD OF ALL DEATHS IN THE WORLD & 50,000+ Americans have died in past 2 months. Pence believes the #TrumpAdministration has been successful in tackling #COVID19 ?! Not wearing masks, opening up––look at the rise in TX, FL, AZ, CA EPIC FAIL for #TeamTrump https://t.co/9BRRHbRlHu
